Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Fleet Tracker - AI-Powered Fleet Management

Features:
- Real-time GPS tracking with TomTom Maps
- AI assistant for natural language queries
- Route optimization and fuel management
- Driver and vehicle management
- Customer portal for delivery tracking
- Inventory management system

Tech: Node.js, Express, Supabase, TomTom SDK, OpenAI
EOF
\)")
